scripts.prepare: husky install && yarn lerna run prepare
scripts.start:ri: run-pty % yarn workspace ri-contracts run start % yarn workspace ri-client run start
scripts.start:client: wait-on tcp:8545 && yarn workspace ri-client run start
scripts.link:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do yarn link @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done
scripts.unlink:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do yarn unlink @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done && yarn install --force
scripts.yalc:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do yalc add @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done
scripts.unyalc:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do yalc remove @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done && yarn install --force
